div.p: Change of global-mean annual surface temperature for different dust loading relative to that for the default (100%) dust loading, for ( a) 6 ka and ( b) 9 ka. Different symbols represent mean values over the northern hemisphere (triangle; 30–90°N), tropics (circle; 30°S–30°N), southern hemisphere (asterisk; 90–30°S), and the whole globe (red filled circle).
